lines.text:
[after being defeated by Daffy]
Duck hunting is too stwenuous. I'll try fishing for a while. Oh, boy! A miniature wed-stwiped bawwacuda!

[Storming in]
Stop right where you are!

[Saxophone riff heard as little fish swims away]
Now you listen to me, buster! If you catch one more fish - *just one more fish* - you'll be in trouble!

[after Large Fish jumps back into the water and Daffy comes out of hiding from under Elmer's hat]
Strong union.
